content: crochet these quick and easy pan protectors in 3 different sizes and safely store your pans and pots without scratches **materials** 3 0-mm c/2 usa 11 uk crochet hook sport 2 fine cotton yarn tapestry needle *this pattern is written in us terms* **yarn** i used schachenmayr catania and lammy yarns rio in the following colors a schachenmayr catania natural 105 b lammy yarns yellow ochre 846 c schachenmayr catania marone 157 feel free to use any yarn that meets gauge **size & yardage** **small** pan diameter 10 5 26 5 cm 110 yds 100 m **medium** pan diameter 13 5 34 cm 148 yds 135 m **large** pan diameter 15 4 39 cm 200 yds 183 m **gauge** 5 rounds of the hexagon base pattern in 4 10 cm measuring along the longest diagonal of the hexagon **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** blog https //raffamusadesigns com/ facebook https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns instagram https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ pinterest https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
